sources.title: Special Agent
sources.description: Johnny Douglas (William Eythe) investigates a train robbery, committed by brothers Paul (George Reeves) and Edmond Devereaux (Paul Valentine), in which Lucille Peters (Kasey Rogers) father (Walter Baldwin) was killed.

sources.title: Special Agent (1949) CRIME THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: William Eythe, Kasey Rogers, Paul Valentine
 Director: William C. Thomas

 Johnny Douglas investigates a train robbery, committed by brothers Paul and Edmond Devereaux, in which Lucille Peters' father was killed.

metadata.Plot: Railroad detective Johnny Douglas investigates a payroll robbery and the murder of a train crew. Tedious but thorough police work leads him to the identities of two brothers, Paul and Ed Devereaux. The Devereaux brothers hide the stolen loot and return to their father's ranch,which they hope to save from foreclosure with the take from the robbery. When the sons of two of the murdered train crew discover the hidden payroll, Johnny has a chance to spring a trap on the Devereaux boys.
metadata.Writer: Milton Raison, Whitman Chambers, Lewis R. Foster
metadata.Actors: William Eythe, George Reeves, Kasey Rogers
